data.title: Clive Barker
data.meta_description: Posts about Clive Barker written by Raven
data.text:
I can honestly say, I am obsessed with Nighbreed (1990). Even though Clive Barker, who wrote and directed the film says he hates it (mainly because of it’s heavy editing), I simply can NOT get enough of it. I love every … Continue reading →

Being a huge fan of Clive Barker, it is no surprise than I absolutely love the 1992 film adaptation of his short story ‘The Forbidden”. The film that made Tony Todd one of the main men of horror, Candyman brings some … Continue reading →

Sleepwalkers (1992) is one of my favorite horror movies for many reasons. Typically, King has the tendency to make a great movie awful by giving it a insane (and often upsetting) ending. However, Sleepwalkers is one of the few that holds … Continue reading →
